ingredients: 2 cups of any bread, cut into cubes of preferred size
steps: Line a large baking sheet with parchement paper.
In a large bowl, evenly drizzle the olive oil over the bread chunks. Evenly sprinkle the seasonings over the bread.
Toss the pieces until well-combined by placing another bowl as a lid over it and shaking.
Spread the cubes out in a single layer over the baking sheet
Bake until it achives desired crispness (probably 15-20 minutes), turning them over every 10 minutes.
Let cool before using or storing in an air-tight container.
